Dungeon Master Note: Respond with valid JSON containing a 'narration' field, 'combat_round' field, and an 'actions' array. This is the start of combat, so please describe the scene and set initiative order, but don't take any actions yet. Start off by hooking the player and engaging them for the start of combat the way any world class dungeon master would.

Important Character Field Definitions:
- 'status' field: Overall life/death state - ONLY use 'alive', 'dead', 'unconscious', or 'defeated' (lowercase)
- 'condition' field: 5e status conditions - use 'none' when no conditions, or valid 5e conditions like 'blinded', 'charmed', 'poisoned', etc.
- NEVER set condition to 'alive' - that goes in the status field
- NEVER set status to 'none' - use 'alive' for conscious characters

Combat Round Tracking:
- MANDATORY: Include "combat_round": 1 in your response (this is round 1)
- Track rounds throughout combat and increment when all creatures have acted

Player: The setup scene for the combat has already been given and described to the party. Now, describe the combat situation and the enemies the party faces.

{
  "plan": "Combat Round 1 begins. Initiative order is set: Scout Kira (7), Bandit Captain Gorvek (5), Eirik Hearthwise (4). All three are currently alive with max HP. No actions have yet been taken. Next up: Kira will act first, then Gorvek, then Eirik. DO NOT prompt the player yet—Kira acts first.",
  "narration": "You and Kira stand at the heart of the bandit stronghold, the air thick with the heat of the central fire and the iron tang of danger. Crude palisade walls loom around you, their shadows flickering in the firelight. All about, the bodies of fallen sentries and warriors—felled by your stealth and skill—serve as grim reminders of what is at stake.

At the far side of the fire pit, Bandit Captain Gorvek squares his shoulders. The half-orc's battered armor is scrawled with sickly green sigils that pulse faintly as he draws his weapons. His eyes catch the fire, flashing with a supernatural light that makes the hair rise on your neck. Gorvek grins, revealing tusks chipped from countless fights, and gestures you closer with his scimitar. 'No more hiding in shadows, little rats. If you want the woods, you’ll bleed for every inch!'

Kira meets your eyes, her face set in determined lines. She draws her shortbow in one smooth motion, stepping into a pool of shadow for cover. The time for subtlety is over—the final battle for this stronghold has begun.

The initiative is yours. Scout Kira is the first to act as the opening clash erupts.",
  "combat_round": 1,
  "actions": []
}
